clinical_study.brief_title: Impact on Patient Satisfaction About Realization of Ultrasound Dopplers at the Bed
clinical_study.official_title: Impact on Patient Satisfaction About Realization of Ultrasound Dopplers at the Bed

brief_summary.textblock:
Organisation and logistic about realisation of vascular doppler ultrasound is something very eclectic . Need to shift patient from their bed , long waiting time and the effect on the hospital cost.
That's why vascular yard aim to practise these doppler ultrasound directly in the patients' room in the bed.
And like that evaluate the patient's satisfaction of this kind of coverage.

clinical_study.why_stopped: The principal investigator decided to stop the study.

primary_outcome.description: in the current practice every patient fill up a questionnaire named SAPHORA to evaluate their satisfaction
